survey_name: Digital Marketing Agency Client Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate client satisfaction with services provided by our digital marketing agency, including campaign performance, communication, and overall value.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your digital marketing campaigns?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels clearly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your digital marketing campaigns?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital marketing services have you used with our agency? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand service utilization patterns.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital marketing services have you used with our agency? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of communication from our account management team?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess communication effectiveness.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of communication from our account management team?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose our agency for your digital marketing needs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights on client motivations.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose our agency for your digital marketing needs?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our digital marketing services to others?
questions.client_notes: Include a follow-up question based on this response to gather additional feedback.

script.question_text: Would you recommend our digital marketing services to others?
